articles.title: Ferne McCann's fashion range 'only makes £2K in a year' despite big ambitions - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Only Way Is Essex alum Ferne McCann has reportedly not found much financial success with her clothing brand Souki Belair after aspiring to see Kylie Jenner wear the brand

Ferne McCann's fashion range reportedly only made £2,300 in a single year.
